sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		CURINV_CARGO_ID as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		VPC_LOCATION as string,
		InventoryStatus as string,
		Accessory as string,
		Hold as string,
		InventoryOrderType as string,
		Tendered as string,
		OrderType as string,
		Brand as string,
		CURINV_MODEL as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		CURINV_DEALERETA as string,
		DELIVERY_TYPE as string,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		VPC_CODE as string,
		VPC as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		Customer as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		CURINV_VPC as string,
		CURINV_HOLDDAMAGE as string,
		ORIGIN_ETD_LOC as string,
		ORIGIN_ETD as string,
		DEST_ETA_LOC as string,
		DEST_ETA as string,
		LEG_ID as integer,
		LEG_DESTINATION as string,
		ACTUAL_ETA as string,
		ACTUAL_ETD as string,
		DEST_LEGID as string,
		LEG_ORIGIN as string,
		DEST_ACTUAL_ETD as string,
		Status as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		Plant as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		ETADate as string,
		Upfit as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		LCDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		FleetBeginDate as string,
		FleetEndDate as string,
		ScheduleOfflineDate as string,
		MARKET as string,
		Profile as string,
		Wholesaled as string,
		VesselName as string,
		State as string,
		Address as string,
		REGION_SHORT_NAME as string,
		REGION_NAME as string,
		DeliveryRegionCode as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		ContactName as string,
		OrderAssignmentDate as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		LC as string,
		FleetOrderNumber as string,
		CustomerReceiptDate as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PlantName as string,
		YardExitDate as string,
		DeliveryDate as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		OrderAssignedLocation as string,
		DropShipFlag as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		CustomerSoldFlag as string,
		POE as string,
		SubOrderType as string,
		SerializationDate as string,
		FinalOKDate as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		REGION_CODE as string,
		DropShipState as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		DISTRICT_CODE as string,
		DISTRICT_NAME as string,
		SALES_DISTRICT as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		CURINV_PLANT as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		DealerName as string,
		ORDER_ASSIGNED_LOCATION as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		Priority as string,
		MODEL_ID as string,
		LotCode as string,
		CurrentStatus as string,
		CustomerReferenceNumber as string,
		LoadNumber as string,
		Manifest as string,
		CARGO_SEQNO as string,
		Age_Start as string,
		Age_Stop as string,
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		CURINV_CARGO_ID as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		VPC_LOCATION as string,
		InventoryStatus as string,
		Accessory as string,
		Hold as string,
		InventoryOrderType as string,
		Tendered as string,
		OrderType as string,
		Brand as string,
		CURINV_MODEL as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		CURINV_DEALERETA as string,
		DELIVERY_TYPE as string,
		RAIL_HEAD_NUMBER as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		VPC_CODE as string,
		VPC as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		Customer as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		CURINV_VPC as string,
		CURINV_HOLDDAMAGE as string,
		ORIGIN_ETD_LOC as string,
		ORIGIN_ETD as string,
		DEST_ETA_LOC as string,
		DEST_ETA as string,
		LEG_ID as integer,
		LEG_DESTINATION as string,
		ACTUAL_ETA as string,
		ACTUAL_ETD as string,
		DEST_LEGID as string,
		LEG_ORIGIN as string,
		DEST_ACTUAL_ETD as string,
		Status as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		Plant as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		ETADate as string,
		Upfit as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		LCDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		FleetBeginDate as string,
		FleetEndDate as string,
		ScheduleOfflineDate as string,
		MARKET as string,
		Profile as string,
		Wholesaled as string,
		VesselName as string,
		State as string,
		Address as string,
		REGION_SHORT_NAME as string,
		REGION_NAME as string,
		DeliveryRegionCode as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		ContactName as string,
		OrderAssignmentDate as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		LC as string,
		FleetOrderNumber as string,
		CustomerReceiptDate as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PlantName as string,
		YardExitDate as string,
		DeliveryDate as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		OrderAssignedLocation as string,
		DropShipFlag as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		CustomerSoldFlag as string,
		POE as string,
		SubOrderType as string,
		SerializationDate as string,
		FinalOKDate as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		REGION_CODE as string,
		DropShipState as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		DISTRICT_CODE as string,
		DISTRICT_NAME as string,
		SALES_DISTRICT as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		CURINV_PLANT as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		DealerName as string,
		ORDER_ASSIGNED_LOCATION as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		Priority as string,
		MODEL_ID as string,
		LotCode as string,
		CurrentStatus as string,
		CustomerReferenceNumber as string,
		LoadNumber as string,
		Manifest as string,
		CARGO_SEQNO as string,
		Age_Start as string,
		Age_Stop as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Inv_LinkFlag,
		Dashboard,
		CURINV_CARGO_ID,
		Org_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		DealerCode,
		VPC_ID,

		DELIVERY_TYPE,

		RailHead,
		Truck_key,
		VPC_CODE,
		VPC,
		LOCATION_ID,
		Customer,
		StatusCode,
		CURINV_VPC,

		ORIGIN_ETD_LOC,
		ORIGIN_ETD,
		DEST_ETA_LOC,
		DEST_ETA,
		LEG_ID,
		LEG_DESTINATION,
		ACTUAL_ETA,
		ACTUAL_ETD,
		DEST_LEGID,
		LEG_ORIGIN,
		DEST_ACTUAL_ETD,
		Status,
		RailHeadDescription,
		RailHeadCodeDescription,
		Plant,
		LOC_TYPE,
		ETADate,
		Upfit,
		CARRIER,
		CARRIERTYPE,
		DESTINATION,
		CustomerSold,
		ShipDate,
		TenderDate,
		LCDate,
		ReceivedDate,
		FleetBeginDate,
		FleetEndDate,
		ScheduleOfflineDate,
		MARKET,
		Profile,
		Wholesaled,
		VesselName,
		State,
		Address,
		REGION_SHORT_NAME,
		REGION_NAME,
		DeliveryRegionCode,
		ModelYear,
		ContactName,
		OrderAssignmentDate,
		ADDRESS1,
		LC,
		FleetOrderNumber,
		CustomerReceiptDate,
		Name,
		City,
		ZipCode,
		PlantName,
		YardExitDate,
		DeliveryDate,
		OrderNumber,
		ModelCode,
		TrimCode,
		ColorCode,

		DropShipFlag,

		POE,

		FinalOKDate,
		AssignedFlag,
		REGION_CODE,
		DropShipState,
		CountryCode,
		DISTRICT_CODE,
		DISTRICT_NAME,
		SALES_DISTRICT,
		CustomerNumber,
		DealerAddress,
		DealerCity,
		DealerState,
		DealerZipCode,
		DealerCountryCode,
		DealerCountryName,
		RouteCode,
		CURINV_PLANT,
		NMCReceiptDate,
		DealerName,
		ORDER_ASSIGNED_LOCATION,
		ModelGroup,
		ModelDescription,
		Priority,
		MODEL_ID,
		LotCode,
		CurrentStatus,
		CustomerReferenceNumber,
		LoadNumber,
		Manifest,
